name: SAMOAI
description:
In the epoch edo an alien invasion takes place, and a hero will have to defeat the fearsome threat.

En la epoca edo una invasion alienigena tiene lugar, y un héroe tendrá que vencer a la temible amenaza.

Controls: 

WASD - Move player

Space - Jump

Right ALT - Attack

Credits:

Music from pack Total Music Collection by Muz Station Productions

SFX from pack Pro Sound Collection by Gamemaster Audio

Tiles, sprites and UI panel by Urigami

Programming by Javier Cantizani
